content:
the other option is not to number at all, but IMO that makes it harder to tell what's going on

mm I'm doing some of the renaming right now and I'm not sure if this is a win :) i.e., it feels like for the source examples at least, it might be nice to not have numbers
broke this out into a separate topic so as not to distract
@nikomatsakis okay! I'm easily convinced of that point
it seems like it has a really high maintenance cost
as does linking to specific line #s for example code :(
unfortunately I have no idea how to do that better without building a new thing
